name: The final bean
description:
Hey! This is my first game in Unity! I made it by following the coding in flow tutorial series! It's a simple parkour game with (at least what I think is a) nice design. New levels to come!

WASDMovementSpaceJumpEnemiesEnemies will act like ones in Mario, jumping on top of them will kill them, but touching them any other way will kill you.CoinsCollecting coins a play a satisfying sound. Later, I'll add coin saving systems and a way to spend them on stuff.
